classes.title: DHED705
classes.subtitle: Medical Emergencies/Local Anesthesia.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This is the fundamental course in local anesthesia for the dental hygienist.  The course covers pharmacology, neuroanatomy, anatomy, neurophysiology as well as administration and techniques of local anesthesia.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED715
classes.subtitle: Current Concepts in Clinical Skills.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This is the fundamental course in local anesthesia for the dental hygienist.  The course covers pharmacology, neuroanatomy, anatomy, neurophysiology as well as administration and techniques of local anesthesia.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED715
classes.subtitle: Current Concepts in Clinical Skills.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This course reviews and updates students in current treatment and diagnostic modalities in dental allied education. Students who satisfactorily pass the evaluation will be exempt.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED720
classes.subtitle: Educational Concepts.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This course reviews and updates students in current treatment and diagnostic modalities in dental allied education. Students who satisfactorily pass the evaluation will be exempt.Repeat rules: May be repeated for credit. Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED720
classes.subtitle: Educational Concepts.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This course is designed to introduce the graduate student to various teaching philosophies and methodologies. A variety of educational concepts such as methods of presentation, testing, and measurement are explored. Emphasis is placed on the practical application of theory.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED730
classes.subtitle: Organization and Administration.  3 Credits.
classes.description: This course is designed to introduce the graduate student to various teaching philosophies and methodologies. A variety of educational concepts such as methods of presentation, testing, and measurement are explored. Emphasis is placed on the practical application of theory.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED730
classes.subtitle: Organization and Administration.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Provides information and experience in leadership, administration, and accreditation for allied dental education programs.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED736
classes.subtitle: Clinical/Laboratory Teaching Practicum.  3 Credits.
classes.description: Provides information and experience in leadership, administration, and accreditation for allied dental education programs.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED736
classes.subtitle: Clinical/Laboratory Teaching Practicum.  3 Credits.
classes.description: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to function as a competent clinical instructor. Psychomotor skill development and analysis and remediation of performance problems are two topics related to clinical teaching that are stressed.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED753
classes.subtitle: Advanced Intraoral Functions.  3 Credits.
classes.description: This course provides students with the knowledge and skills to function as a competent clinical instructor. Psychomotor skill development and analysis and remediation of performance problems are two topics related to clinical teaching that are stressed.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED760
classes.subtitle: Seminar in Education and Research.  1 Credit.

classes.title: DHED760
classes.subtitle: Seminar in Education and Research.  1 Credit.
classes.description: This course is designed to provide knowledge and stimulate discussion about pertinent topics in dental and allied dental education and research.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED774
classes.subtitle: Personnel Management Seminar.  2 Credits.
classes.description: This course is designed to provide knowledge and stimulate discussion about pertinent topics in dental and allied dental education and research.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED837
classes.subtitle: Internship.  6-9 Credits.
classes.description: This full semester internship provides the student with the opportunity to student teach in an allied dental program.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.title: DHED860
classes.subtitle: Seminar in Education and Research.  1 Credit.
classes.description: This full semester internship provides the student with the opportunity to student teach in an allied dental program.Grading status: Letter grade.

classes.subtitle: Seminar in Education and Research.  1 Credit.
